parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number of the page to return.

parameters.name: DstType
parameters.description: The service to which the data to be de-identified belongs. Valid values include **1**, **2**, **3**, **4**, and **5**. The value 1 indicates MaxCompute. The value 2 indicates Object Storage Service (OSS). The value 3 indicates AnalyticDB for MySQL. The value 4 indicates Tablestore. The value 5 indicates ApsaraDB RDS.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range during which the de-identification tasks to be queried are created. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh_cn**. Valid values:

*   **zh_cn**: Chinese
*   **en_us**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: SearchKey
parameters.description: The keyword used to query the de-identification tasks, which can be the task name or ID.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range during which the de-identification tasks to be queried are created. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.
